H0.text: Which vegetable has the Latin name alium cepa. Onion

H1.text: Which vegetable has the Latin name alium cepa. Garlic

H2.text: Which vegetable has the Latin name alium cepa. Shallot

H3.text: Which vegetable has the Latin name alium cepa. Pyaz

A4.text: The onion plant (Allium cepa), also known as the bulb onion or common onion, is the most widely cultivated species of the genus Allium.

A5.text: The shallot is a botanical variety of the onion which was classified as a separate species until 2011.
